TopicTitle: "Eve: Order Zero" -- a KSP Graphic Novel (POSTLUDE COMPLETE...bet you didn't see THAT coming.)

Articles.Content: I don't know if you're using mods or not (doesn't look like it), but maybe they can discover Karborundrum on Eve or something. Then again, it's like, megaOP.

> 
> "Billmobile" refers to the surface craft that Val's ship will deliver to Eve. "Mortingale" refers to the payload as well as the delivery ship. I suppose when they drop it off they'll call it "Mortingale Rover" of "Fundyfunfun" or something.

Thanks for the clarification! It's useful that any possible mishaps or issues the crew will have to deal can be blamed on Mort's modifications ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Oh, and

BOOOOOOOOOO!

HISSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS!
Intensity intensifies. What about intercepting the MortBillEvomaticLanderSSTO from suborbit? Sneaky RCS circularization? Probe core madness?

Lots of great speculation, none of which I will confirm or deny! But I can give you three more pages...

![tZOq0yv.png](http://i.imgur.com/tZOq0yv.png)

![LYrRYkI.png](http://i.imgur.com/LYrRYkI.png)

![uP1D1YR.png](http://i.imgur.com/uP1D1YR.png)
Awesome, I got ninja'd by a new post! MOAR!

Well Kuzzter, that's a pretty impressive looking piece of machinery.

I can't wait to see what tricks it has up it's sleeve.

Happy landings!

> 
> I can't wait to see what tricks it has up it's sleeve.

That statement is maybe a bit more literal than you might have thought when you wrote it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> That statement is maybe a bit more literal than you might have thought when you wrote it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

What? But... It doesn't have a sleeve! ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)
Spaceships don't have layers, they have sleeves?

> 
> That statement is maybe a bit more literal than you might have thought when you wrote it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

But that means... how did you fit the whole m7 inside!? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
I've got a feeling there might have been a doubleDistraction.

Haha, for once, Mort is actually right ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Nevertheless: Boooooo

I would actually like to register a complaint about this story, Kuzzter: This happens much too often:

![Reputation%20woes.png](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/20576590/KSP/Forum/Reputation%20woes.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-11T08:32:52Z" title="09/11/2015 08:32  AM" data-short="8 yr">September 11, 2015</time> by Deddly**

> 
> That statement is maybe a bit more literal than you might have thought when you wrote it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Oooh, something fancy. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Can't wait to see what it is.

All right, we've waited long enough. Let's do this.

![TnyDB7A.png](http://i.imgur.com/TnyDB7A.png)

![2fOQ2jL.png](http://i.imgur.com/2fOQ2jL.png)

![hie48JX.png](http://i.imgur.com/hie48JX.png)

![LBR6L9Y.png](http://i.imgur.com/LBR6L9Y.png)

Whooo! So, you're going to have some questions. Yes I did fly the Fundstar all the way to KSC2. It had more than 2/3 fuel left when it landed, so if I ever want to do the Kerbin Circumnavigation challenge I've got my ship. Yes, I hyperedited the M7 onto the pad--VERY carefully. In-story explanation will follow. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-11T17:43:00Z" title="09/11/2015 05:43  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 11, 2015</time> by Kuzzter**
Well then! Now I'm excited, no longer bummed by Mort's takeover
Oh HELL yes!

> 
> Hmm... but weren't lisa and val there when bill announced a plan? why rat him out? unless... the m7 was already stolen... and set up in a remote launch location where mort can't see it!

Called it! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I assume the tourists were booted out somewhere? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Once again, the final panel says it all.

You've certainly got me thinking about who's actually in on the plan.

And I suppose the tourists are stuck sitting in the Fundstar with stale snacks 'til this is over.

Happy landings!

> 
> I assume the tourists were booted out somewhere? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Tourists can't EVA. They're stuck there until either I recover the Fundstar Two, or somebody shows up to fly it back to KSC1. I can only imagine the flight reviews they'll post to kexpedia.kom. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

"Oh HELL yes!" Epic ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) In yo face, Mortie! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif) I can't wait to learn, how the konspirators managed to transport entire spaceship off-site without someone noticing.

Hah!

Y'know, I consistently forget about KSC2. And I've even got KerbinSide installed. ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

> 
> "Oh HELL yes!" Epic ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) In yo face, Mortie! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif) I can't wait to learn, how the konspirators managed to transport entire spaceship off-site without someone noticing.

I'm betting they stole raw materials and gathered disgruntled ex-employees to build a whole new one in the ksc2 vab
Three cheers for Bobak!
Grand Theft Rocket yeah!
